9/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear pale golden with a small bubbly white head. Aroma of zesty citrus, wheat and herb. Medium sweetness, moderate bitterness, light tartness. Moderate body, slightly oily, average carbonation. Refreshing.
Clear golden appearance with a small head. Slightly dry with a medium body. Very refreshing and well balanced. A good take on this pleasant German style, which is one of my favourites. A nice beer with the bonus of being a new brewery for me.
7/9/2022. Can shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear pale orange gold with a small bubbly white head. Aroma of orange, pineapple, passionfruit, tart peach, rubbery pine. Medium sweetness, moderate bitterness, light tart edge. Moderate body, oily, spritzy. Nice tart and sweet mix to finish. Decent.
15/9/2022. Can shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear pale gold with a small frothy white head. Aroma of citrus, light tropical fruits, grass, straw, touch of herb. Quite sweet, light bitterness. Moderate body, oily, prickly carbonation. 
15/9/2022. Can shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours hazy dark amber bronze with a small bubbly off-white head. Aroma is malty, woody, earthy, sherry, dried fruits, prunes, caramel, chocolate. Medium sweetness, moderate bitterness. Medium body, oily, average carbonation. Enjoyable. 
1/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear golden with minimal head. Aroma is tangy apple, funky, caramel, tannic, touch woody, apple pie. Medium sweetness, light bitterness and tartness. Medium body, oily sticky mouthfeel, sparkling carbonation. Sweet and tangy finish. Liked this.
Bottle.Hazy yellow colour with medium white head.Aroma of spices and herbs,yeast and bananas,flavors aswell medium body and lively finish.
5/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours dark brown with a small bubbly beige head. Aroma of roasted malt, dark chocolate, wood, whiskey, hedgerow berries, dark fruits. Moderate sweetness, medium bitterness. Moderate body, a little watery, soft carbonation. Bitter woody finish. Quite okay.
8/9/2022. Can shared by Matt, cheers. Pours cloudy pale orange gold with minimal head. Aroma is sweet, cherry bakewell, marzipan, coconut, pineapple, orange, light toasted marshmallow. Quite heavy sweetness, but with a nice bit of tartness developing. Medium body, soft carbonation. Yes it's sweet but I quite liked it.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear golden with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is pungent, mucky manure, sugars, burnt plastic, caramel, sweet apple. Quite sweet, with a touch tart. Medium body, oily, soft carbonation. Interesting.
Poured black body tan lace. Aroma dark malts some caramel. A little smoke. Taste is medium sweet to bitter light chocolate and coffee with a smoky finish. Palate medium bodied grainy texture soft carbonation and a bitter smoked finish. Nicely done.
6/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear pale golden with a large short lasting bubbly white head. Aroma of sweet apple, elderflower, gooseberry, citrus. Medium sweetness, moderate bitterness, light tart edge. Moderate body, slightly oily, quite fizzy. Quite nicely done.
7/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear very pale pink with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is herbal, spiced, ginger, slightly mucky, methanol edge. Medium sweetness, touch of spiced bitterness. Light o moderate body, oily and watery, fizzy.
6/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear very pale gold with a small short lasting bubbly white head. Aroma of pineapple cubes, flowers, sweet apple, pineapple upside-down cake, light sulphur edge. Medium sweetness, minimal tartness. Light body, watery and oily, quite fizzy. Sweet and vaguely tangy citric finish. Not bad.
9/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear pink with a few bubbles. Aroma of strawberry, lime, citrus, funky notes. Moderate sweetness, crisp citric acidic tartness. Moderate body, slightly sticky, average carbonation. Quite likeable.
9/9/2022. Can shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours slightly hazy pale orange gold with a small frothy off-white head. Aroma of pineapple, orange, melon, bready malts, yeast. Moderate sweetness, medium bitterness. Moderate body, average carbonation. Pretty decent.
Cristal clear deeper golden beer under a medium, just yellowish, collapsing head. Very 'beery' nose, toasted malts, straw, bit spicy-peppery. Bitter-ish on top of sweet & lightly toasted malts; grain wafers, corn flakes and a I soupçon /I of bitterness, that gets a bit metallic in the finish. Every new sip starts sweet. Light bodied, gristslickness, good carbonation. Quite average, indeed. Aptly named.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear gold with minimal head. Aroma of tart apple juice, stewed apple, touch of clove. Light sweetness, moderate sourness. Moderate body, soft carbonation. Dry sharp sour finish. Nicely done.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear pale gold with minimal bubbly white head. Aroma of honey, flowers, melon, touch of herb. Quite sweet, light bitter edge. Medium body, sticky, soft to flat carbonation. Nicely done.
16/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear bright gold with minimal head. Aroma of honey, flowers, hedgerow, citrus, vanilla, sultanas, touch of solvent. Quite sweet with light bitterness. Medium body, sticky, no carbonation. Very nice.
16/9/2022. Can shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours very dark brown with a small bubbly beige head. Aroma of roasted malt, chocolate, caramel, dark fruits, berries, coconut. Moderate sweetness, medium bitterness and body. Oily, average carbonation. Good.
7/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear pale gold with a short lasting foamy white head. Aroma of sweet apple, citrus, caramel, yeast, sulphur. Sweet, with a light tart edge. Moderate body, oily and sticky, above average carbonation.
9/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear pale golden with a minimal bubbles. Aroma of sweet caramel, green apple, sugary stewed apples. Medium sweetness, light bitterness and tartness. Moderate body, average carbonation. Easy drinker, nicely balanced. Enjoyed it.
9/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear pale golden with a minimal bubbles. Aroma of sweet caramel, green apple, sugary stewed apples. Medium sweetness, light bitterness and tartness. Moderate body, average carbonation. Easy drinker, nicely balanced. Enjoyed it.
Cask at Tap & Can, Shrewsbury. Pours opaque orange golden with a white cap. Aroma: citrus, grapefruit, tropical, wheat, grassy. Taste: light to moderate sweet & bitter, wheat, bread, lemon, grass, some minerality. Medium body with fine carbonation. Proper.
1/9/2022. BIAB serving shared by danlo, cheers Ed. Pours hazy golden orange with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is light woody, funky, vanilla, caramel, slightly peppery and herbal, Moderate sweetness, light bitterness, touch of tart. Moderate body, slightly watery, average carbonation. Dry and bitter finish. Didn't click with me so much.
9/9/2022. Bottle shared by Matt, cheers. Pours clear bright golden amber with a small bubbly white head. Aroma of semi-sweet stewed apple, caramel, vanilla, touch of citrus. Moderate sweetness, light tartness. Medium body, soft carbonation. Light dryness to finish. Nicely done.
15/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear very dark maroon brown with a small frothy off-white to beige head. Aroma of roasted malt, chocolate, cocoa, coffee, dark fruit. Moderate sweetness, moderate roasted bitterness. Medium body, slightly creamy, average carbonation. Nice one.
9/9/2022. Can shared by Matt, cheers. Pours clear dark maroon brown with a small bubbly off-white head. Aroma is cooking chocolate, chocolate ice cream, toffee, vanilla, malted chocolate drink. Quite sweet with a light roasted bitterness. Moderate body, a little watery, soft carbonation. Something a little different to the norm, and quite nicely done.
8/9/2022. Can shared by Matt, cheers. Pours clear very pale yellow gold with minimal head. Aroma of sweet malt, sweet lemon, yeast, hint of yuzu. Sweet and sticky. Watery. Not very good.
13/9/2022. Can shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours almost black with a small bubbly beige head. Aroma is roasted malt, dark chocolate, earthy, coffee, berries and beetroot. Moderate sweetness and light roasted bitterness with a tart edge. Medium body, quite smooth, soft carbonation. A bit odd, not a big fan of this.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale gold with minimal head. Aroma of pear, citrus, grass, malt, caramel. Medium sweetness, light bitterness, moderate tartness. Medium body, smooth, soft carbonation. Lovely bittersweet and tart mix to finish. Enjoyed this.
Bottle shared by Caleb. Poured clear dark amber color with an average frothy white head that lasted with very good lacing. Moderate to heavy barrel aged earthy malt aroma.  Medium to abundant body with a smooth texture and soft carbonation. Moderate to heavy complex sweet flavor with a moderate to heavy whiskey sweet finish of medium to long duration. This is an interesting standout beer.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale gold with minimal head. Aroma of pear, citrus, grass, malt, caramel, yeast, lightly woody and peaty whiskey. Moderate sweetness and bitterness with light tartness. Medium body, oily, soft carbonation. Peaty worty finish. Liked it, but preferred the non cask version.
1/9/2022. BIAB serving shared by danlo, cheers Ed. Pours slightly hazy dark golden orange with minimal head. Aroma is sweet passion fruit, pineapple cubes, peach, flowers, caramel, slightly dusty edge. Medium to heavy sweetness, light bitterness, touch tart. Moderate body, slightly watery, low carbonation. Nice aroma, pretty decent overall, just lacked a bit of body. 
Keg at Tap & Can, Shrewsbury. Pours unclear orange golden with a white cap. Aroma: grains, bread, grassy. Taste: light to moderate sweet & bitter, grains, light stone fruit, grass, pine needles. Medium body with moderate carbonation.
13/9/2022. Can shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours black with a small frothy beige head. Aroma is blueberries, blackcurrant, chocolate, vanilla, roasted malt, black cherry. Medium sweetness and light roasted bitterness with a slight tart edge. Medium body, quite oily, average carbonation. Tangy dark fruity finish. Good.
13/9/2022. Can shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours black with a good size frothy beige head. Aroma is roasted malt, dark chocolate, vanilla, dark fruits, nut. Medium sweetness, light bitterness, slight tart edge. Medium body, lightly fizzy.
9/9/2022. Bottle shared by Matt, cheers. Pours almost clear pale orange with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is sweet baked apple, toffee apple, hint of clove and a woody edge. Medium sweetness, light tart edge. Medium body, soft carbonation. Very nice.
9/9/2022. Bottle shared by Matt, cheers. Pours clear pale golden orange with a small bubbly white head. Aroma of orange, grass, flowers, grain, malt, mild stone fruits. Quite sweet, light bitterness. Light bodied, slightly oily, soft carbonation. Easy drinker.
1/9/2022. BIAB serving shared by danlo, cheers Ed. Pours slightly hazy golden with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is funky, mucky, apple, straw, vanilla, touch of citrus. Medium sweetness, light tartness. Moderate body, oily, spritzy carbonation. Dry, woody, tannic finish.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear dark gold with a small bubbly white head. Aroma of apple, light funk, baked apple, apple core, leathery edge. Moderate sweetness, light tartness. Medium body, spritzy carbonation. Crisp and lightly dry finish. Very nice.
8/9/2022. Bottle shared by Matt, cheers. Pours clear golden amber with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is crisp apple, woody, lightly funky, earthy, touch of citrus. Medium sweetness, light tartness. Medium body, smooth, very soft carbonation. Nice dryness to start, finishes sweeter. Very nice.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale golden with a very small bubbly white head. Aroma is whiskey, woody, orange, burnt rubber, peat, flowers. Moderate sweetness, light bitterness, light tartness. Medium body, slightly oily, soft to flat carbonation. Dry, woody, peaty finish. Very nice.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear bright gold with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is whiskey, floral, citrus, slight smoke. Moderate sweetness, increasing in finish. Light bitterness, moderate tartness. Medium body, slightly oily, minimal carbonation. Nice, dry, tangy finish. Very nice.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear bright golden with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is woody, whiskey, vanilla, light funky notes. Light sweetness, medium tartness. Moderate body, slightly oily, low carbonation. Dry, tart, astringent finish. Enjoyable.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear golden with minimal bubbly head. Aroma is light woody, apple, vanilla, lightly funky, slight vinegar edge. Moderate to medium sweetness, moderate bitterness, light tartness. Medium body, slightly oily, soft to flat carbonation. Crisp, dry finish. Very good.
Draught, half pint. @"Belgian Beer Weekend 2022", Grand Place Brussels (Belgium). 04/09/2022
[#5.347 Global - #187 Belgium - #3 Brouwerij Roman]
Pours golden with a small white head. Aroma: grass, spiced malts and brown bread. Taste: corn, spiced malts and yeast. Light and grainy.
Next one please!
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale orange amber with minimal head. Aroma is woody, floral, pear, vanilla, caramel, brown sugar. Medium sweetness, light tart edge. Medium body, very smooth, minimal carbonation. Dry woody finish. Really good.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale golden with minimal head. Aroma is lightly woody, vanilla, light funky, solvent, spiced rum. Moderate sweetness, touch tart. Moderate body, quite smooth, low carbonation. Subtle drying finish. Good.
1/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear very pale gold with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is funky, woody, pear, fairly sweet, picking up the rum barrel very nicely. Taste is moderately sweet and tart. Medium body, oily, average carbonation. Nice tart woody finish. Very nice.
7/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear golden with minimal head. Aroma of sweet apples, flowers, straw. Quite heavy sweetness. Moderate body, oily and sticky, average carbonation.
Draught, half pint. @"Belgian Beer Weekend 2022", Grand Place Brussels (Belgium). 04/09/2022
[#5.346 Global - #186 Belgium - #1 Brasserie de Bertinchamps (My Belgian brewery #75)]
Pours hazy yellow with a white head. Aroma: spiced malts, straw and yeast. Taste: belgian yeast, spiced straw and soft lemony. Crisp grainy finish.
Next one please!
5/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours dark brown with a small bubbly beige head. Nice Christmas spiced aroma, nutmeg, clove, cinnamon, orange rind, dried fruits, fruit cake. Moderate cakey sweetness, quite bitter. Moderate body, soft carbonation. Enjoyable yuletide beer.
17/9/2022. Can shared by danlo, cheers Ed. Pours hazy pale gold with a small frothy white head. Aroma of stone fruits, orange, dank hops, pine, slight peppery edge. Moderate sweetness, quite heavy bitterness. Medium body, average to soft carbonation. Nice mellowed bitter finish. Good.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours slightly hazy golden with a small bubbly white head. Aroma of baked apple, cinnamon, spice, leather, light funky notes. Medium sweetness, light bitterness and tartness. Moderate body, slightly oily, soft carbonation. Light dryness to finish. Enjoyable.
1/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale yellow gold with a small rim of bubbles. Aroma is green apple, light funky and woody, caramel, apple pie. Medium sweetness, light bitterness, touch of tart. Moderate body, sparkling carbonation. Sweet finish. Likeable.
Can from Sommar Bar, Birmingham. Pours oily pitch black with a decent tan cap. Aroma: bitter roast, light burnt malts, chocolate, leather. Taste: light to moderate sweet & moderate bitter, rich, roast malts, dark chocolate, burnt malts, nuts, toffee. Dry taste.
Medium body with fine carbonation. Tasty!
9/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed. Pours clear almost colourless, just a very pale golden tint, with a few bubbles. Aroma of sweet pears, honey, caramel, vanilla. Heavy syrupy sweetness. Moderate body, sticky, low carbonation. 
17/9/2022. Can shared by danlo, cheers Ed. Pours cloudy pale yellow gold with a small frothy white head. Aroma of pineapple, orange, passionfruit, grapefruit, papaya, grass, pine. Moderate sweetness, medium bitterness, light tartness. Medium body, slightly creamy, average carbonation. Nice bitter finish. Good.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear dark gold with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is apple core, quite acidic, light funk, touch of sulphur. Moderate sweetness and bitterness, light tartness. Moderate body, slightly oily, average to soft carbonation. 
330ml. bottle. @"Lambik-O-Doom", Lot (Belgium). 04/09/2022
[#5.345 Global - #185 Belgium - #18 Brouwerij 3 Fonteinen]
Pours golden with a lasting white head. Aroma: straw, bread and spiced malts. Taste: straw and crisp malts. Bit fizzy.
Next one please!
9/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours black with a small frothy beige coloured head. Aroma is roasted malt, milk chocolate, caramel, coffee, molasses, nut. Medium sweetness, moderate bitterness. Medium body, oily, average carbonation. Nice roasted finish. Well done, and the most enjoyable I've had from this brewery.
500ml bottle. Stingy, greasy and heavy with berry notes, dark chocolate and earthiness. Quite heavy.
500ml bottle. Heavy and intense with roastiness, coffee, apple notes and syrup. Quite sweet and heavy.
750ml bottle. Funky and sourish with some earthiness and tartness. Quite balanced.
330ml. bottle. @"Lambik-O-Doom", Lot (Belgium). 04/09/2022

500ml bottle. Stingy, greasy and heavy with berry notes, dark chocolate and earthiness. Quite heavy.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale golden with minimal head. Aroma is lightly woody, vanilla, light funky, solvent, spiced rum. Moderate sweetness, touch tart. Moderate body, quite smooth, low carbonation. Subtle drying finish. Good.

7/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear golden with minimal head. Aroma of sweet apples, flowers, straw. Quite heavy sweetness. Moderate body, oily and sticky, average carbonation.

14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours slightly hazy golden with a small bubbly white head. Aroma of baked apple, cinnamon, spice, leather, light funky notes. Medium sweetness, light bitterness and tartness. Moderate body, slightly oily, soft carbonation. Light dryness to finish. Enjoyable.
1/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale yellow gold with a small rim of bubbles. Aroma is green apple, light funky and woody, caramel, apple pie. Medium sweetness, light bitterness, touch of tart. Moderate body, sparkling carbonation. Sweet finish. Likeable.
Can from Sommar Bar, Birmingham. Pours oily pitch black with a decent tan cap. Aroma: bitter roast, light burnt malts, chocolate, leather. Taste: light to moderate sweet & moderate bitter, rich, roast malts, dark chocolate, burnt malts, nuts, toffee. Dry taste.
Medium body with fine carbonation. Tasty!

Next one please!
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale orange amber with minimal head. Aroma is woody, floral, pear, vanilla, caramel, brown sugar. Medium sweetness, light tart edge. Medium body, very smooth, minimal carbonation. Dry woody finish. Really good.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale golden with minimal head. Aroma is lightly woody, vanilla, light funky, solvent, spiced rum. Moderate sweetness, touch tart. Moderate body, quite smooth, low carbonation. Subtle drying finish. Good.
1/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear very pale gold with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is funky, woody, pear, fairly sweet, picking up the rum barrel very nicely. Taste is moderately sweet and tart. Medium body, oily, average carbonation. Nice tart woody finish. Very nice.
7/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours clear golden with minimal head. Aroma of sweet apples, flowers, straw. Quite heavy sweetness. Moderate body, oily and sticky, average carbonation.
Draught, half pint. @"Belgian Beer Weekend 2022", Grand Place Brussels (Belgium). 04/09/2022
[#5.346 Global - #186 Belgium - #1 Brasserie de Bertinchamps (My Belgian brewery #75)]
Pours hazy yellow with a white head. Aroma: spiced malts, straw and yeast. Taste: belgian yeast, spiced straw and soft lemony. Crisp grainy finish.

5/9/2022. Bottle shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours dark brown with a small bubbly beige head. Nice Christmas spiced aroma, nutmeg, clove, cinnamon, orange rind, dried fruits, fruit cake. Moderate cakey sweetness, quite bitter. Moderate body, soft carbonation. Enjoyable yuletide beer.
17/9/2022. Can shared by danlo, cheers Ed. Pours hazy pale gold with a small frothy white head. Aroma of stone fruits, orange, dank hops, pine, slight peppery edge. Moderate sweetness, quite heavy bitterness. Medium body, average to soft carbonation. Nice mellowed bitter finish. Good.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours slightly hazy golden with a small bubbly white head. Aroma of baked apple, cinnamon, spice, leather, light funky notes. Medium sweetness, light bitterness and tartness. Moderate body, slightly oily, soft carbonation. Light dryness to finish. Enjoyable.
1/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale yellow gold with a small rim of bubbles. Aroma is green apple, light funky and woody, caramel, apple pie. Medium sweetness, light bitterness, touch of tart. Moderate body, sparkling carbonation. Sweet finish. Likeable.
Can from Sommar Bar, Birmingham. Pours oily pitch black with a decent tan cap. Aroma: bitter roast, light burnt malts, chocolate, leather. Taste: light to moderate sweet & moderate bitter, rich, roast malts, dark chocolate, burnt malts, nuts, toffee. Dry taste.
Medium body with fine carbonation. Tasty!
9/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed. Pours clear almost colourless, just a very pale golden tint, with a few bubbles. Aroma of sweet pears, honey, caramel, vanilla. Heavy syrupy sweetness. Moderate body, sticky, low carbonation.

Moderate sweetness, medium bitterness, light tartness. Medium body, slightly creamy, average carbonation. Nice bitter finish. Good.

14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours slightly hazy golden with a small bubbly white head. Aroma of baked apple, cinnamon, spice, leather, light funky notes. Medium body with fine carbonation. Tasty!

8/9/2022. Bottle shared by Matt, cheers. Pours clear golden amber with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is crisp apple, woody, lightly funky, earthy, touch of citrus. Medium sweetness, light tartness. Medium body, smooth, very soft carbonation. Nice dryness to start, finishes sweeter. Very nice.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale golden with a very small bubbly white head. Aroma is whiskey, woody, orange, burnt rubber, peat, flowers. Moderate sweetness, light bitterness, light tartness. Medium body, slightly oily, soft to flat carbonation. Dry, woody, peaty finish. Very nice.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear bright gold with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is whiskey, floral, citrus, slight smoke. Moderate sweetness, increasing in finish. 9/9/2022. Bottle shared by Matt, cheers. Pours almost clear pale orange with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is sweet baked apple, toffee apple, hint of clove and a woody edge. Medium sweetness, light tart edge. Medium body, soft carbonation. Very nice.
9/9/2022. Bottle shared by Matt, cheers. Pours clear pale golden orange with a small bubbly white head. Aroma of orange, grass, flowers, grain, malt, mild stone fruits. Quite sweet, light bitterness. Light bodied, slightly oily, soft carbonation. Easy drinker.
1/9/2022. BIAB serving shared by danlo, cheers Ed. Pours slightly hazy golden with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is funky, mucky, apple, straw, vanilla, touch of citrus. Medium sweetness, light tartness. Moderate body, oily, spritzy carbonation. Dry, woody, tannic finish.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear dark gold with a small bubbly white head. Aroma of apple, light funk, baked apple, apple core, leathery edge. Moderate sweetness, light tartness. Medium body, spritzy carbonation. Crisp and lightly dry finish. Very nice.
8/9/2022. Bottle shared by Matt, cheers. Pours clear golden amber with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is crisp apple, woody, lightly funky, earthy, touch of citrus. Medium sweetness, light tartness. Medium body, smooth, very soft carbonation. Nice dryness to start, finishes sweeter. Very nice.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale golden with a very small bubbly white head. Aroma is whiskey, woody, orange, burnt rubber, peat, flowers. Moderate sweetness, light bitterness, light tartness. Medium body, slightly oily, soft to flat carbonation. Dry, woody, peaty finish. Very nice.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear bright gold with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is whiskey, floral, citrus, slight smoke. Moderate sweetness, increasing in finish. 14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear bright golden with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is woody, whiskey, vanilla, light funky notes. Light sweetness, medium tartness. Moderate body, slightly oily, low carbonation. Dry, tart, astringent finish. Enjoyable.

8/9/2022. Bottle shared by Matt, cheers. Pours clear golden amber with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is crisp apple, woody, lightly funky, earthy, touch of citrus. Medium sweetness, light tartness. Medium body, smooth, very soft carbonation. Nice dryness to start, finishes sweeter. Very nice.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale golden with a very small bubbly white head. Aroma is whiskey, woody, orange, burnt rubber, peat, flowers. Moderate sweetness, light bitterness, light tartness. Medium body, slightly oily, soft to flat carbonation. Dry, woody, peaty finish. Very nice.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear bright gold with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is whiskey, floral, citrus, slight smoke. Moderate sweetness, increasing in finish. Light bitterness, moderate tartness. Medium body, slightly oily, minimal carbonation. Nice, dry, tangy finish. Very nice.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear bright golden with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is woody, whiskey, vanilla, light funky notes. Light sweetness, medium tartness. Moderate body, slightly oily, low carbonation. Dry, tart, astringent finish. Enjoyable.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear golden with minimal bubbly head. Aroma is light woody, apple, vanilla, lightly funky, slight vinegar edge. Moderate to medium sweetness, moderate bitterness, light tartness. Medium body, slightly oily, soft to flat carbonation. Crisp, dry finish. Very good.

8/9/2022. Bottle shared by Matt, cheers. Pours clear golden amber with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is crisp apple, woody, lightly funky, earthy, touch of citrus. Medium sweetness, light tartness. Medium body, smooth, very soft carbonation. Nice dryness to start, finishes sweeter. Very nice.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale golden with a very small bubbly white head. Aroma is whiskey, woody, orange, burnt rubber, peat, flowers. Moderate sweetness, light bitterness, light tartness. Medium body, slightly oily, soft to flat carbonation. Dry, woody, peaty finish. Very nice.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear bright gold with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is whiskey, floral, citrus, slight smoke. Moderate sweetness, increasing in finish. Light bitterness, moderate tartness. Medium body, slightly oily, minimal carbonation. Nice, dry, tangy finish. Very nice.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear bright golden with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is woody, whiskey, vanilla, light funky notes. Light sweetness, medium tartness. Moderate body, slightly oily, low carbonation. Dry, tart, astringent finish. Enjoyable.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear golden with minimal bubbly head. Aroma is light woody, apple, vanilla, lightly funky, slight vinegar edge. Moderate to medium sweetness, moderate bitterness, light tartness. Medium body, slightly oily, soft to flat carbonation. Crisp, dry finish. Very good.
Draught, half pint. @"Belgian Beer Weekend 2022", Grand Place Brussels (Belgium). 04/09/2022
[#5.347 Global - #187 Belgium - #3 Brouwerij Roman]
Pours golden with a small white head. Aroma: grass, spiced malts and brown bread. Taste: corn, spiced malts and yeast. Light and grainy.
Next one please!
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale orange amber with minimal head. Aroma is woody, floral, pear, vanilla, caramel, brown sugar. Medium sweetness, light tart edge. Medium body, very smooth, minimal carbonation. Dry woody finish. Really good.
14/9/2022. Bottle shared by danlo, cheers Ed! Pours clear pale golden with minimal head. Aroma is lightly woody, vanilla, light funky, solvent, spiced rum. Moderate sweetness, touch tart. Moderate body, quite smooth, low carbonation. Subtle drying finish. Good.
13/9/2022. Can shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours black with a small frothy beige head. Aroma is blueberries, blackcurrant, chocolate, vanilla, roasted malt, black cherry. Medium sweetness and light roasted bitterness with a slight tart edge. Medium body, quite oily, average carbonation. Tangy dark fruity finish. Good.
13/9/2022. Can shared by SHIG, cheers. Pours black with a good size frothy beige head. Aroma is roasted malt, dark chocolate, vanilla, dark fruits, nut. Medium sweetness, light bitterness, slight tart edge. Medium body, lightly fizzy.
9/9/2022. Bottle shared by Matt, cheers. Pours almost clear pale orange with a small bubbly white head. Aroma is sweet baked apple, toffee apple, hint of clove and a woody edge. Medium sweetness, light tart edge. Medium body, soft carbonation. Very nice.
